title: devboard
description: Devboard is a personal project built with Next.js 14 (Pages Router), TypeScript, and Material UI (MUI) to showcase a dynamic dashboard interface. It leverages React Query for efficient data fetching and management, providing a learning experience in integrating modern web development technologies. The repository serves as a practical example of building a full-stack application with robust front-end architecture.

title: robofleet-dashboard
description: The robofleet-dashboard repository contains a project built using JavaScript, Python, HTML, and CSS to create a user interface. This dashboard provides a visual interface, built to manage, monitor, and interact with a fleet of robots. It aims to give operators a consolidated and informative overview of the robots' status, tasks, and environments, facilitating efficient remote control and decision-making, while showcasing skills in full-stack web development and robotics integration.

title: crud-expense-tracker
description: This repository hosts a simple CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) expense tracker application built using JavaScript, CSS, and HTML. It provides a practical demonstration of basic web development principles and utilizes Material-UI for a clean and responsive user interface. This project serves as a learning tool and a foundation for building more complex financial management applications.

title: jovian
description: Jovian is a full-stack CRUD application built with Python, Flask, PostgreSQL, HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting. This project demonstrates the creation of a web application using a microframework, a robust relational database, and front-end technologies to manage data effectively. It explores topics such as database interactions, web development fundamentals, and the implementation of Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations.

title: Map-Visualisation
description: Map-Visualisation is a project built using HTML and Python focused on creating interactive and insightful map visualizations. This repository explores techniques for representing geographical data, potentially using libraries like Folium or similar, to display information on a map interface. The project aims to provide a user-friendly way to explore and understand spatial datasets through engaging visual representations.

title: raven-v2
description: Raven-v2 is a personal project exploring modern web development techniques, built with TypeScript and JavaScript. This repository serves as a playground for experimenting with new technologies and implementing various project ideas, showcasing practical application of front-end and potentially back-end development concepts.

title: NextJs-Dashboard
description: NextJs-Dashboard is a project showcasing a modern dashboard implementation built with Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript. This repository provides a practical example of building a responsive and interactive user interface, leveraging the power of server-side rendering and static site generation offered by Next.js. It serves as a learning resource and a foundation for developing similar dashboard applications.

title: resume
description: This repository contains the source code for my resume, built using TeX for generating the PDF document and HTML for a web-based version. It serves as a project demonstrating my ability to present information professionally and manage documents using both LaTeX and web development technologies, falling under the broader category of personal projects and document creation.

title: next-idea-board
description: Next Idea Board is a collaborative project management tool built with Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript, designed to help teams brainstorm, organize, and prioritize ideas effectively. This project focuses on providing a clean and intuitive interface for visualizing and managing project workflows, facilitating better team communication and idea development.

title: sleep-debt-tracker
description: Sleep Debt Tracker is a web application built with TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS to help users visualize and manage their sleep debt. This project allows users to track their sleep patterns, calculate their sleep debt based on individual sleep goals, and provides a clear visual representation of their sleep data. Focused on providing a user-friendly interface for understanding and improving sleep habits, it utilizes modern web development practices and is tagged as a project demonstrating practical application of TypeScript.

title: next-voting
description: Next-voting is a full-stack web application built with Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript for creating and participating in voting events. This project enables users to create polls with various options, allowing others to cast their votes securely and view real-time results. The application focuses on providing a user-friendly interface and leveraging modern web development practices for a smooth and engaging voting experience.

title: finance-with-python
description: This repository contains Jupyter Notebooks with Python code exploring various finance-related topics. It provides hands-on projects and examples demonstrating how to leverage Python for financial analysis, data visualization, and potentially algorithmic trading strategies. The content focuses on practical application and covers key concepts within the realm of finance using Python libraries.

title: iot-asset-tracking
description: This repository hosts a modern IoT asset tracking web application built with Next.js, TypeScript, and styled with Tailwind CSS. It leverages Supabase for backend functionalities, providing a robust and scalable solution for managing and monitoring asset locations. The project showcases best practices for building full-stack TypeScript applications with serverless functions and real-time data integration.

title: dynamic-event-calendar
description: Dynamic-event-calendar is a JavaScript, CSS, and HTML-based project designed to provide a visually appealing and interactive calendar for managing and displaying events. This repository showcases a dynamic approach to event scheduling, allowing users to easily add, view, and organize events within a customizable calendar interface. The project focuses on delivering a user-friendly experience for event management and aims to be easily adaptable and integrated into various web applications.

title: genietalks
description: GenieTalks is a web application built with TypeScript, Vite, and Express.js that leverages the Gemini API to provide interactive conversational AI experiences. This project demonstrates a modern full-stack architecture incorporating HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for the front-end, focusing on showcasing the capabilities of large language models within a dynamic, user-friendly interface.

title: atg-world
description: ATG-World is a project built using TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, likely a web application or website. The repository focuses on demonstrating project-based learning and showcases the implementation of front-end development skills. The code within provides a tangible example of building interactive and visually appealing user interfaces using modern web technologies.

title: ros-log-viewer
description: Ros-log-viewer is a web-based tool for visualizing and analyzing ROS (Robot Operating System) log files. Built with JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting, this project provides a user-friendly interface to efficiently parse, filter, and display ROS log data, aiding in debugging and understanding robot system behavior. It focuses on improving the development workflow within the ROS ecosystem by making log analysis more accessible and efficient.

title: fruit-seller
description: Fruit-Seller is a full-stack e-commerce project built with Next.js 14 (Pages Router), TypeScript, and styled with Material UI (MUI). This repository showcases a type-safe approach to building a modern online store, utilizing React Query for efficient data fetching and management. It serves as a practical example for developers interested in learning or implementing e-commerce functionalities with a focus on clean architecture and a robust type system.
